context: Good! I like dark comedies, like Fargo (1996), do you have any recommendations?

rec: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (1998)
resp: For sure it is a really good movie gets in your head. I will always suggest Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas (1998) . I've seen the movie and read the book, for sure a great one.
